entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except temperature steady near minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12 except temperature steady near minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
